title: Can religion be science?
author: VD
content_html:
Ever notice how some atheists who use science to attack religion often engage in a little sleight of hand? RELIGION cannot be science because GOD is not theoretically falsifiable. But God is not religion. Christianity, for example, is eminently falsifiable since there are various means of disproving it, such as finding Jesus Christ’s uncrucified body or ending poverty, and I suspect the same is true of a number of other religions.

Unfortunately, the name “Christian Science” is already taken. Now, how would one go about falsifying Buddhism?
